attributes.action: Hang your heads in shame and resign. You are incapable of doing your job.
attributes.additional_details:
ALL MPs, from every party... Your day of reckoning is here. You have shown the very people who put you in these positions of power a level of complacency and apathy that is lamentable. It is now apparent to all how completely useless you really are.
Make a decision, you have 8 options - choose one!

Tick tock.
attributes.background:
The British public has voted to leave the European Union.
The politicians of the UK have used the time between the vote and the brexit date to do nothing for the country, but instead have played political games for their own interest. This country is a laughing stock for the rest of the world.

rejection.details: This would be a decision for individual MPs and not the UK Government and Parliament as a whole.
